short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark Faceit users with emojis to remember how they played in the past.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The add-on displays a drop-down menu with a list of emojis. You can visit other people's profiles and assign emojis to them to help you group people based on their play style.

When you choose one of the emojis, your choise is saved only to local storage. Your choises are not sychronized across computers and are not stored online.
